actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum capital gains tax rate by one-half for taxpayers age 55 and older.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum capital gains tax rate by one-half of the current rate for taxpayers who are 55 years or older (as of the last day of the taxable year).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum capital gains tax rate by one-half for taxpayers age 55 and older.
